title: 820-2914 a
message:
customer brought in computer,  it powers on, starts to load apple logo makes a fuzzy line across the top part of the screen then goes to a blank white screen. any ideas where to look or start?  tried booting with a good osx still the same thing.  i ran asd efi everything was good, but when trying to run asd os it crashes at the same point during start up.

appreciate any help.  
Thanks 
nate

title: 820-2914 a
message: Take to Apple for a free repair for GPU issues.
